CommandAlias / Instruction.message:
Add list of command alias. Do not start command with the '/'
These aliases, by design, do not work with macros.
CommandAlias / Instruction.description:
[CommandAlias] Command Alias - Add list of command alias. Do not start command with the '/'
These aliases, by design, do not work with macros.

CommandAlias / MacroHelp.message:
Aliases are not supported in macros to prevent them from being sent to the server in the event you back them up on server.
Please use the original command in your macros.

LongVeil / Description.message: Replaces the wedding veils with their long variants that are usually only shown in the sanctum of the twelve.

UiAdjustments@ComboTimer / Description.message: Shows a countdown for combo actions.

UiAdjustments@CustomFreeCompanyTags / De.message: Allows hiding or customizing Free Company and Wanderer tags.

UiAdjustments@CustomTimeFormat / Descrip.message: Allows setting custom time formats for the in game clock. Uses C# formatting strings.

UiAdjustments@ExamineItemLevel / Descrip.message:
Calculates the item level of other players when examining them.
Red value means the player is wearing an item that scales to their level and it is showing the max level.

UiAdjustments@ExpPercentage / Descriptio.message: Calculate and display the current EXP percentage on the EXP bar.

UiAdjustments@ExtendedDesynthesisWindow.message:
Shows your current desynthesis level and the item's optimal level on the desynthesis item selection window.
Also indicates if an item is part of a gear set, optionally preventing selection of gearset items.

UiAdjustments@ExtraEstateTeleportation /.message: Add the Estate Teleportation option to more locations.

UiAdjustments@HideAchievementsNotificati.message: Completely hides the login/zone-in notification for achievements nearing completion.

UiAdjustments@HideJobGauge / Description.message: Allow hiding the job gauge while not in combat or dungeons.

UiAdjustments@ImprovedWorldVisit / Descr.message: Cleans up the world visit menu and shows your current location in order on the list.

UiAdjustments@LargeCooldownCounter / Des.message: Increases the size of cooldown counters on hotbars.

UiAdjustments@LimitTargetStatusEffects /.message: Sets a limit on the number of status effects displayed on your target.

UiAdjustments@MarketEnhancements / Descr.message: UI Enhancements for market board such as including tax and highlighting laxy tax.

UiAdjustments@MinimapAdjustments / Descr.message: Allows hiding elements of the minimap display.

UiAdjustments@NotificationToastAdjustmen.message: Allows moving or hiding of the notifications that appears in the middle of the screen at various times.

UiAdjustments@ParameterBarAdjustments /.message: Allows hiding or moving specific parts of the parameter bar (HP and mana bars).

UiAdjustments@PartyListStatusTimers / De.message: Show timers on status effects on the party list.

UiAdjustments@ReducedDeepDungeonInfo / D.message: Removes the redundant infos from the deep dungeon character info.

UiAdjustments@RemoveCommunityFinder / De.message: Hide the community finder buttons from social windows.

UiAdjustments@SellMaxTripleTriadCards /.message: Set the default number of cards to sell at the Triple Triad Trader to the number of cards you have.
Default to max when selling Triple Triad Cards

UiAdjustments@ShiftTargetCastBarText / D.message: Moves the text on target castbars to make it easier to read

UiAdjustments@ShowShieldOnHPBar / Descri.message: Show approximate shield on the HP Bar.

UiAdjustments@SmartNameplates / Descript.message: Provides options to hide other player's nameplates in combat under certain conditions.

UiAdjustments@TargetHP / Description.message: Displays the exact (or optionally rounded) value of target's hitpoints.

UiAdjustments@TimerOnDutyWaiting / Descr.message: Shows the 45 second countdown after readying for a duty.

UiAdjustments@TimeUntilGpMax / Descripti.message: Shows a countdown when playing Gathering classes to estimate the time until their GP is capped.
